lead_paragraph: Michael Jordan finally spoke out on Monday about racial tensions in America in hopes of easing conflicts between blacks and law enforcement.

headline.main: Jordan Gives $2M; Looks to Build Trust Between Blacks, Cops
headline.print_headline: Jordan Gives $2M; Looks to Build Trust Between Blacks, Cops

snippet: Michael Jordan finally spoke out on Monday about racial tensions in America in hopes of easing conflicts between blacks and law enforcement....
